data.content:
noun
pice de rsistance /piˌɛsdərəˌziːˈstɑːns/ , pl pices de rsistance /piˌɛsdərəˌziːˈstɑːns/
[count] :the best or most important thing or event
The pice de rsistance of the whole concert was when the two bands came onstage to perform together.
The waiter suggested we try the restaurant's pice de rsistance: the chocolate souffl.
